str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
Of Hebrew origin; Jacob, the progenitor of the Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Esau, elder son of Isaac the patriarch, brother of Jacob. Of Hebrew origin; Esau, an Edomite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hate, detest, love less, esteem less. From a primary misos; to detest; by extension, to love less.
